abstract: The AMC series “Mad Men” continues to generate interest in the real-life executives who worked in advertising during the years in which the show is set.
snippet: The AMC series “Mad Men” continues to generate interest in the real-life executives who worked in advertising during the years in which the show is set.
lead_paragraph: 5:16 p.m. | Updated The popularity of the AMC series “Mad Men” continues to generate interest in the real-life executives who worked in advertising during the years in which the show is set.

headline.main: Feting Marquee Names of the ‘Mad Men’ Era
